history.proof: intros f g a b Hexf Hexg. destruct Hexf as [If Hf]. destruct Hexg as [Ig Hg]. exists (plus If Ig). apply is_RInt_plus; auto.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
V: NormedModule R_AbsRing

Goal:
forall (f g : R -> V) (a b : R), ex_RInt f a b -> ex_RInt g a b -> ex_RInt (fun y : R => plus (f y) (g y)) a b

Premises:
Notation NormedModule := NormedModule.type
ex_RInt = fun (f : R -> V) (a b : R) => exists If : V, is_RInt f a b If : (R -> V) -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope]
f = fun f : family => let (ind, f0, _) := f in f0 : family -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [_ R_scope R_scope] f is a coercion
plus = fun G : AbelianGroup => AbelianGroup.plus G (AbelianGroup.class G) : forall G : AbelianGroup, G -> G -> G Argument G is implicit and maximally inserted
*** [ R : Set ]
ex_RInt_scal : forall (f : R -> V) (a b k : R), ex_RInt f a b -> ex_RInt (fun y : R => scal k (f y)) a b
ex_RInt_ext : forall (f g : R -> V) (a b : R), (forall x : R, Rmin a b < x < Rmax a b -> f x = g x) -> ex_RInt f a b -> ex_RInt g a b
is_RInt_plus : forall (f g : R -> V) (a b : R) (If Ig : V), is_RInt f a b If -> is_RInt g a b Ig -> is_RInt (fun y : R => plus (f y) (g y)) a b (plus If Ig)
ex_RInt_opp : forall (f : R -> V) (a b : R), ex_RInt f a b -> ex_RInt (fun x : R => opp (f x)) a b
ex_RInt_swap : forall (f : R -> V) (a b : R), ex_RInt f a b -> ex_RInt f b a
ex_RInt_Chasles : forall (f : R -> V) (a b c : R), ex_RInt f a b -> ex_RInt f b c -> ex_RInt f a c
ex_RInt_Chasles_0 : forall (f : R -> V) (a b c : R), a <= b <= c -> ex_RInt f a b -> ex_RInt f b c -> ex_RInt f a c
ex_RInt_comp_opp : forall (f : R -> V) (a b : R), ex_RInt f (- a) (- b) -> ex_RInt (fun y : R => opp (f (- y))) a b
ex_RInt_comp_lin : forall (f : R -> V) (u v a b : R), ex_RInt f (u * a + v) (u * b + v) -> ex_RInt (fun y : R => scal u (f (u * y + v))) a b
ex_RInt_ub : forall (f : R -> V) (a b : R), ex_RInt f a b -> exists M : R, forall t : R, Rmin a b <= t <= Rmax a b -> norm (f t) <= M
is_RInt_ext : forall (f g : R -> V) (a b : R) (l : V), (forall x : R, Rmin a b < x < Rmax a b -> f x = g x) -> is_RInt f a b l -> is_RInt g a b l
is_RInt_opp : forall (f : R -> V) (a b : R) (If : V), is_RInt f a b If -> is_RInt (fun y : R => opp (f y)) a b (opp If)
is_RInt_scal : forall (f : R -> V) (a b k : R) (If : V), is_RInt f a b If -> is_RInt (fun y : R => scal k (f y)) a b (scal k If)
ex_RInt_point : forall (f : R -> V) (a : R), ex_RInt f a a
is_RInt_swap : forall (f : R -> V) (a b : R) (If : V), is_RInt f b a If -> is_RInt f a b (opp If)
ex_RInt_const : forall (a b : R) (v : V), ex_RInt (fun _ : R => v) a b
is_RInt_comp_opp : forall (f : R -> V) (a b : R) (l : V), is_RInt f (- a) (- b) l -> is_RInt (fun y : R => opp (f (- y))) a b l
is_RInt_Chasles_2 : forall (f : R -> V) (a b c : R) (l1 l2 : V), a < b < c -> is_RInt f a c l1 -> is_RInt f a b l2 -> is_RInt f b c (minus l1 l2)
is_RInt_Chasles_0 : forall (f : R -> V) (a b c : R) (l1 l2 : V), a < b < c -> is_RInt f a b l1 -> is_RInt f b c l2 -> is_RInt f a c (plus l1 l2)
is_RInt_Chasles_1 : forall (f : R -> V) (a b c : R) (l1 l2 : V), a < b < c -> is_RInt f a c l1 -> is_RInt f b c l2 -> is_RInt f a b (minus l1 l2)
is_RInt_comp_lin : forall (f : R -> V) (u v a b : R) (l : V), is_RInt f (u * a + v) (u * b + v) l -> is_RInt (fun y : R => scal u (f (u * y + v))) a b l
is_RInt_Chasles : forall (f : R -> V) (a b c : R) (l1 l2 : V), is_RInt f a b l1 -> is_RInt f b c l2 -> is_RInt f a c (plus l1 l2)
is_RInt_point : forall (f : R -> V) (a : R), is_RInt f a a zero
Riemann_sum_plus : forall (f g : R -> ?V) (ptd : SF_seq), Riemann_sum (fun x : R => plus (f x) (g x)) ptd = plus (Riemann_sum f ptd) (Riemann_sum g ptd) where ?V : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- ModuleSpace R_Ring]
Rlt_Rminus : forall a b : R, a < b -> 0 < b - a
is_RInt = fun (f : R -> V) (a b : R) (If : V) => filterlim (fun ptd : SF_seq => scal (sign (b - a)) (Riemann_sum f ptd)) (Riemann_fine a b) (locally If) : (R -> V) -> R -> R -> V -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope _]
continuous_plus : forall (f g : ?U -> ?V) (x : ?U), continuous f x -> continuous g x -> continuous (fun x0 : ?U => plus (f x0) (g x0)) x where ?U : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- UniformSpace] ?K : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- AbsRing] ?V : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- NormedModule ?K]
is_RInt_const : forall (a b : R) (v : V), is_RInt (fun _ : R => v) a b (scal (b - a) v)
Riemann_fine = fun a b : R => within (fun ptd : SF_seq => pointed_subdiv ptd /\ SF_h ptd = Rmin a b /\ last (SF_h ptd) (SF_lx ptd) = Rmax a b) (locally_dist (fun ptd : SF_seq => seq_step (SF_lx ptd))) : R -> R -> (SF_seq -> Prop) -> Prop Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope function_scope]
filterlim_comp : forall (T U V : Type) (f : T -> U) (g : U -> V) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) (G : (U -> Prop) -> Prop) (H : (V -> Prop) -> Prop), filterlim f F G -> filterlim g G H -> filterlim (fun x : T => g (f x)) F H
Rminus_le_0 : forall a b : R, a <= b < -> 0 <= b - a
Rminus_lt_0 : forall a b : R, a < b < -> 0 < b - a
Riemann_sum_norm : forall (f : R -> ?V) (g : R -> R) (ptd : SF_seq), pointed_subdiv ptd -> (forall t : R, SF_h ptd <= t <= last (SF_h ptd) (SF_lx ptd) -> norm (f t) <= g t) -> norm (Riemann_sum f ptd) <= Riemann_sum g ptd where ?V : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- NormedModule R_AbsRing]
Riemann_fine_filter : forall a b : R, ProperFilter (Riemann_fine a b)
Riemann_sum = fun (V : ModuleSpace R_Ring) (f : R -> V) (ptd : SF_seq) => foldr plus zero (pairmap (fun x y : R * R => scal (fst y - fst x) (f (snd y))) (SF_h ptd, zero) (SF_t ptd)) : forall V : ModuleSpace R_Ring, (R -> V) -> SF_seq -> V Argument V is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ function_scope _]
filterlim_ext : forall f g : ?T -> ?U, (forall x : ?T, f x = g x) -> filterlim f ?F ?G -> filterlim g ?F ?G where ?T : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- Type] ?U : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- Type] ?F : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?G : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- (?U -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- Filter ?F]
filterlim_comp_2 : forall (f : ?T -> ?U) (g : ?T -> ?V) (h : ?U -> ?V -> ?W), filterlim f ?F ?G -> filterlim g ?F ?H -> filterlim (fun x : ?U * ?V => h (fst x) (snd x)) (filter_prod ?G ?H) ?I -> filterlim (fun x : ?T => h (f x) (g x)) ?F ?I where ?T : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- Type] ?U : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- Type] ?V : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- Type] ?W : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- Type] ?F : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?G : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- (?U -> Prop) ->...-> Prop] ?FF : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- Filter ?F]
filterlim_locally_ball_norm : forall (f : ?T -> ?U) (y : ?U), filterlim f ?F (locally y) < -> (forall eps : posreal, ?F (fun x : ?T => ball_norm y eps (f x))) where ?K : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- AbsRing] ?T : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- Type] ?U : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- NormedModule ?K] ?F : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- Filter ?F]
Riemann_sum_cons : forall (f : R -> ?V) (h0 : R * R) (ptd : SF_seq), Riemann_sum f (SF_cons h0 ptd) = plus (scal (SF_h ptd - fst h0) (f (snd h0))) (Riemann_sum f ptd) where ?V : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- ModuleSpace R_Ring]
Filter_prod : forall (F : (?T -> Prop) -> Prop) (G : (?U -> Prop) -> Prop) (P : ?T * ?U -> Prop) (Q : ?T -> Prop) (R : ?U -> Prop), F Q -> G R -> (forall (x : ?T) (y : ?U), Q x -> R y -> P (x, y)) -> filter_prod F G P where ?T : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- Type] ?U : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- Type]

```coq
intros f g a b Hexf Hexg.
destruct Hexf as [If Hf].
destruct Hexg as [Ig Hg].
exists (plus If Ig).
apply is_RInt_plus; assumption.
Qed.```

original: intros f g a b Hexf Hexg. destruct Hexf as [If Hf]. destruct Hexg as [Ig Hg]. exists (plus If Ig). apply is_RInt_plus; auto.
